constant.name: Pre_defined_organization_or_person_in_organization_assignment_types
constant.expression: [ 'author', 'classification officer', 'creator', 'custodian', 'customer', 'design supplier', 'editor', 'id owner', 'location', 'manufacturer', 'owner', 'read access', 'supplier', 'wholesaler', 'write access', 'organization in contract']

constant.name: Pre_defined_work_request_types
constant.expression: [ 'change of standard', 'cost reduction', 'customer rejection', 'customer request', 'durability improvement', 'government regulation', 'production alignment', 'procurement alignment', 'production relief', 'production requirement', 'quality improvement', 'security reason', 'standardization', 'supplier request', 'technical improvement', 'tool improvement']

where.label: WR1
where.expression: (EXISTS (street_number) OR EXISTS (street) OR EXISTS (postal_box) OR EXISTS (town) OR EXISTS (region) OR EXISTS (postal_code) OR EXISTS (country) OR EXISTS (internal_location) OR EXISTS (facsimile_number) OR EXISTS (telephone_number) OR EXISTS (electronic_mail_address) OR EXISTS (telex_number))

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY( item <* SELF\Identification_assignment.items | NOT ('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.ALIAS_IDENTIFICATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(item) ) )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(it<* SELF\Classification_assignment.items | NOT('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.DEFINABLE_OBJECTS' IN TYPEOF(it)) AND definitional ))=0

entity.name: Detailed_geometric_model_element
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Cartesian_point, Direction, Axis_placement, Cartesian_transformation_2d, Cartesian_transformation_3d) ANDOR ONEOF (Cartesian_point, Direction, Axis_placement, Cartesian_transformation_2d, Cartesian_transformation_3d, Curve, Point_on_curve, Point_on_surface, Surface, Vector) ANDOR ONEOF (Cartesian_point, Direction, Axis_placement, Cartesian_transformation_2d, Cartesian_transformation_3d, Curve, Point_on_curve, Point_on_surface, Surface)

where.label: WR4
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(it1 <* SELF\Representation.items | SIZEOF(QUERY(it2 <* SELF\Representation.items | it1.name = it2.name)) > 1 ))= 0

derived.name: valid_conservative_node
derived.expression: ( ( SIZEOF (USEDIN ( SELF , 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.BUS_ELEMENT_LINK.PRECEDENT_ELEMENT' ) ) + SIZEOF ( USEDIN ( SELF , 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.BUS_ELEMENT_LINK.SUBSEQUENT_ELEMENT' ) ) + SIZEOF (USEDIN ( SELF , 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.FUNCTIONAL_UNIT_TERMINAL_NODE_ASSIGNMENT.COMPOSED_NODE' )) + SIZEOF ( external_node_access ) ) > 1 )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT(SIZEOF(analytical_model_application_reference) = 1) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY( am <* access_mechanism | NOT((SIZEOF(USEDIN(am,'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.ANALYTICAL_MODEL_PORT_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_ITEM')) = 0) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY( ampa <* USEDIN(am, 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.ANALYTICAL_MODEL_PORT_ASSIGNMENT.ASSIGNED_ITEM') | NOT(analytical_model_application_reference[1] :=: ampa.associated_analytical_model_application) )) = 0)) )) = 0)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY( item <* SELF\Classification_assignment.items | NOT ('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.CLASSIFICATION_ITEM' IN TYPEOF(item) ) )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: ('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.STATISTICAL_TOLERANCE_CHARACTERISTIC' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.SYMMETRICAL_TOLERANCE_CHARACTERISTIC' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR ('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.PLUS_MINUS_TOLERANCE_CHARACTERISTIC' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(it <* SELF\Representation.items | NOT('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.LENGTH_DATA_ELEMENT' IN TYPEOF(it)) )) = 0)

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.SYMMETRICAL_TOLERANCE_CHARACTERISTIC' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(it <* SELF\Representation.items | ('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.LENGTH_DATA_ELEMENT' IN TYPEOF(it)) )) = 1)

where.label: WR3
where.expression: NOT('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.STATISTICAL_TOLERANCE_CHARACTERISTIC' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(it <* SELF\Representation.items | ('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.LENGTH_DATA_ELEMENT' IN TYPEOF(it)) )) = 1)

where.label: WR5
where.expression: ('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.PLUS_MINUS_TOLERANCE_CHARACTERISTIC' IN TYPEOF(SELF)) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(it <* SELF\Representation.items | NOT(('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.VALUE_WITH_TOLERANCES' IN TYPEOF(it)) AND ('AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.LENGTH_DATA_ELEMENT' IN TYPEOF(it\Value_with_tolerances.item_value))) )) = 0)

entity.name: Measure_item
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Measure_item_with_precision, Numerical_item_with_global_unit, Numerical_item_with_unit, Value_limit, Value_limit_with_global_unit, Value_list, Value_range, Value_range_with_global_unit, Value_set, Value_with_tolerances)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY(pvr <* QUERY ( r <* USEDIN(SELF, 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.REPRESENTATION.ITEMS')| 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.PROPERTY_VALUE_REPRESENTATION' IN TYPEOF(r)) | EXISTS(pvr.context_of_items.units) )) > 0

entity.name: Tolerance_characteristic
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Minimum_tolerance_characteristic, Statistical_tolerance_characteristic, Symmetrical_tolerance_characteristic, Maximum_tolerance_characteristic, Plus_minus_tolerance_characteristic, Nominal_tolerance_characteristic) ANDOR Length_tolerance_characteristic

entity.name: Unit
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Amount_of_substance_unit, Electric_current_unit, Length_unit, Luminous_intensity_unit, Mass_unit, Plane_angle_unit, Ratio_unit, Solid_angle_unit, Thermodynamic_temperature_unit, Time_unit)

entity.name: Value_with_unit
entity.super.expression: ONEOF (Absorbed_dose_data_element, Activity_data_element, Amount_of_substance_data_element, Angle_data_element, Area_data_element, Capacitance_data_element, Celsius_temperature_data_element, Conductance_data_element, Dose_equivalent_data_element, Electric_charge_data_element, Electric_current_data_element, Electromotive_force_data_element, Energy_data_element, Force_data_element, Frequency_data_element, Illuminance_data_element, Inductance_data_element, Length_data_element, Luminous_flux_data_element, Luminous_intensity_data_element, Magnetic_flux_data_element, Magnetic_flux_density_data_element, Mass_data_element, Power_data_element, Pressure_data_element, Ratio_data_element, Resistance_data_element, Scattering_parameter_data_element, Solid_angle_data_element, Thermodynamic_temperature_data_element, Volume_data_element)

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pv <* Product_version | ( NOT ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'INFORMATION_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pv) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'INFORMATION_PRODUCT' IN TYPEOF ( pv.of_product) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pvd <* Product_view_definition | ( NOT ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF (pvd) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pvd.defined_version) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pv <* Product_version | ( NOT ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pv) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'ANALYTICAL_MODEL' IN TYPEOF ( pv.of_product) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( dd <* Product_view_definition | ( NOT ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF (dd) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( dd.defined_version) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pv <* Product_version | ( NOT ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pv) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'DOCUMENT' IN TYPEOF ( pv.of_product) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pv <* Product_version | ( NOT ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'PART_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pv) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'PART' IN TYPEOF ( pv.of_product) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pvd <* Product_view_definition | ( NOT ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'PART_VIEW_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF (pvd) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'PART_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pvd.defined_version) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pvd <* Product_view_definition | ( NOT ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'SOFTWARE_DEFINITION' IN TYPEOF (pvd) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'SOFTWARE_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pvd.defined_version) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( pv <* Product_version | ( NOT ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'SOFTWARE_VERSION' IN TYPEOF ( pv) ) ) AND ( 'AP210_FUNCTIONAL_SPECIFICATION_ARM_LF.' + 'SOFTWARE' IN TYPEOF ( pv.of_product) ) ) ) =0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY (p1 <* Document | SIZEOF(QUERY (p2 <* Document | (NOT(p1 :=: p2) AND (p1.id = p2.id)))) > 0 )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY (p1 <* Part | SIZEOF(QUERY (p2 <* Part | (NOT(p1 :=: p2) AND (p1.id = p2.id)))) > 0 )) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF(QUERY (p1 <* Requirement | SIZEOF(QUERY (p2 <* Requirement | (NOT(p1 :=: p2) AND (p1.id = p2.id)))) > 0 )) = 0

function.name: acyclic_representation_relationship
bag_to_set
consistent_bus_structural_definition
get_document_definition
types_of_product
valid_document_property_representation
